title: Things2KeepUWarm Long Hot Water Bottle Seasonal Design (Grey Sloth)
features: Things2KeepUWarm Long Hot Water bottle in sloth design.
An unusual and innovative new shape hot water bottle by Cozytime
Our long hot water bottle is a great warming gift for loved ones
A long hot water bottle and cover included.
description: Product description Great gift for your loved ones, unusual but very useful hot water bottle. Can be used to comfort and warm the whole of the legs, arms, upper body or sooothe and relax. Things2KeepUWarm Long Hot Water in sloth design. Its shape offers greater coverage of parts of your body that can be kept warm at the same time and aches and pains can be reached more easily. The long tubular hot water bottle holds between 2-2.5 litres of water ad measures approx 80cm x 12cm. Great for soothing areas such as the spine, neck and shoulders and to warming your whole body. Great for kids and adults.
